description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 1st 2023 at 2:00PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pmEST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: In-Service Support De-icing Systems

#### Tender Reference:
WS3943782363

#### Solicitation Number:
WS3943782363

#### Publication Date:
Tuesday, April 3rd, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date:
Thursday, June 1st, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

#### Amendment Number:
3

#### Amendment Date:
Tuesday, May 15, 2023

#### Expected Contract Start Date:
Tuesday, July 4th, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date:
To be Determined

#### Tender Status:
Tender is Expired

#### Brief Project Description:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders from qualified contractors to provide in-service support to the de-icing systems at the Timiskaming (Quebec and Ontario) and Latchford dams. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing all resources necessary to maintain and operate these systems, including personnel, equipment, tools, and materials.

#### Notice Type:
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Procurement Method:
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Evaluation Criteria:
Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements:
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others.

#### Geographic Location:
The project will take place in Latchford and Témiscaming, Quebec.

#### Contracting Authority:
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information:
Pierre Lavigne - pierre.lavigne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15890056?extsite=MTU4OTAwNTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please submit your tender by Thursday, June 1st, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT, to be considered for the project. Late submissions will not be accepted. 

**Note:** The tender description is available under the attached file or by visiting the provided notice URL. It is your responsibility to ensure that you have access to all required information before submitting your tender.

I have written the text in a more professional and concise manner while maintaining the accuracy of the information provided. I have used a clear structure and headings to make it easier
